amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill on an unmanned aircraft system or to operate any such system owned by the Department of Interior for the performance of surveying, mapping, or collecting remote sensing data.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill on an unmanned aircraft system or to operate any such system owned by the Department of Interior for the performance of surveying, mapping, or collecting remote sensing data.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A107) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A107) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A107) offered by Mr. Perry.
